name: Graydle Moon Base
text: You can destroy 1 "Graydle" card you control to Special Summon 1 "Graydle Dragon" from your Extra Deck. If that monster is sent to the GY, you can add 1 "Graydle" monster from your GY to your hand. You can only activate this effect of "Graydle Moon Base" once per turn. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can destroy 1 monster on the field.
